message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
I understand that $150 might be a bit steep for you, Bob. However, I'm still quite attached to the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $135. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $125? I think that's a fair price for a product like this.
I'm still not willing to go below $130, Bob. I think the product is worth more than that. I'm willing to compromise again and offer it to you for $130. That's the lowest I can go. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $127.50? I think that's a fair price for a product like this.

I'm getting a bit frustrated with the back-and-forth, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I'm not going to go any lower. I'll offer it to you for $129. That's as low as I can go. Take it or leave it.
